main event: Lights were observed for almost 2 hours above a neighbor's house in Island Park, New York on August 21, 1965.
interesting points: The lights appeared one at a time, like a bright moon.
4 lights were observed during the 2 hour period.
Photo analysis identified the UFOs as point sources of light, with camera movement probably causing each point of light to appear as a larger irregular image.
The object was described as a 'pretty big thing' that moved steadily towards the witness at 25-30 feet, which the witness said did not seem like any normal aircraft.
The object was maneuverable and changed direction more than once during its flight, with no engine noise or other sound associated with it.
photographs: Yes, 4 negatives and 7 prints were submitted for analysis, but the photography was of poor quality
